Mr Eric Schmidt would continue to act as an advisor to Mr Page and co-founder Mr Sergey Brin . Page will take charge of Google's day-to-day operations as Chief Executive Officer starting April 4. Sergey Brin will focus on strategic projects, in particular working on new products, Mr Eric Schmidt said in the blog spot.
